title: Looking for anything even close to this vintage font...
content:
Hi! I am looking for something as close a possible to this vintage Spider-Man font.

All recommendations will be welcomed!

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015061528im_/http:/typophile.com/files/spideyfont_5095.jpg)
author: pwagner3

comments.content: not sure I would say it's close, but how about [Mad Scissors](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015061528/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/la-goupil/mad-scissors/)?
Makes me think of one of Lutz Baar's fonts - [Antropos](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015061528/http:/www.dafont.com/antropos.font?text=SPIDER-MAN).
[Sheldon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015061528/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pintassilgo/sheldon/) doesn't look bad. not as blocky/choppy, but still sortof classic comic in a way.
